hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LOAD_DIRECTORY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The path to the directory containing a vcfIndex.tsv describing the vcf files to load

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf /usr/local/docker-config/hpds_temp mkdir -p /usr/local/docker-config/hpds_temp/all
rm -rf /usr/local/docker-config/hpds_bak/all mkdir -p rm -rf /usr/local/docker-config/hpds_bak/all
cp /usr/local/docker-config/hpds/encryption_key $LOAD_DIRECTORY/encryption_key
docker run \ -v $LOAD_DIRECTORY:/opt/local/hpds \ -v $LOAD_DIRECTORY:vcfLoad:/opt/local/hpds/vcfInput \ -v /usr/local/docker-config/hpds_temp/all:/opt/local/hpds/vcfOutput \ -e HEAPSIZE=4096 -e LOADER_NAME=CSVLoader hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:LATEST && \
mv /usr/local/docker-config/hpds/all /usr/local/docker-config/hpds_bak/all && \ mv /usr/local/docker-config/hpds_temp/all /usr/local/docker-config/hpds/all
